Message:
I love looking at maps~!
Just by looking at one,
a whole day will go by
before I even know it!

Everyone always asks me
what’s so fun about maps, but...

Mmmm... I just wonder
why nobody else gets
how great maps are!
Maps are the shape of the world!

You can learn how places
you’ve never been to before look,
and they’re so much fun~!

Oh, I know!
Since I’m traveling
the whole world,
I should write a travel diary
while making my map, too~!

I’ll start right now by
writing down how these snacks
the innkeeper from yesterday
gave me taste~♪

But, they’re making
me a little thirsty...
Time for tea~
